detectors.description:
Reentrancy in RugPool.exit() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RugPool.sol#463-466):
	External calls:
	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RugPool.sol#464)
		- rugStake.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RugPool.sol#380)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RugPool.sol#309)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RugPool.sol#465)
		- rugReward.safeTransfer(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RugPool.sol#472)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RugPool.sol#309)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RugPool.sol#465)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RugPool.sol#417)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RugPool.sol#465)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RugPool.sol#416)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RugPool.sol#465)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RugPool.sol#471)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RugPool.sol#419)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RugPool.sol#465)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RugPool.sol#420)
